plot: Homer has to use Sideshow Bob in order to track down a potential assassin.

A mystery assassin is out to kill Homer and,after several attempts,he consults Sideshow Bob who,as a would-be killer,understands the mind of a murderer and comes to stay with the Simpsons to expose the killer. After Homer is named Mardi Gras King and rides on a float his would-be murderer is exposed,as Junior,the son of Frank Grimes,the nuclear power plant employee for whose death Junior blames Homer. After Junior's arrest Bob resists the opportunity to kill a sleeping Bart as he is now so accustomed to him.—don @ minifie-1
